lines.text: So-- (laughs) I heard a rumor that you sort of saved my life in a really creepy sort of way. I talk to people. I talk to so many people. I find out things. Secrets aren't safe when Vex is around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any coffee in this fucking castle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, I have a present for you, because I feel like you're going to really like it. Would you like it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's random. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have this armor that I think would be really great on you. Do you want it? It's really expensive. If you don't take it quickly, I might change my mi--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll give you the leather armor after I have a chance to change.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I love you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (softly) I know. I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get breakfast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From that point, the smell of coffee begins to fill the air from the inside of the Whitestone castle halls. The servants have prepared breakfast, and a meal is ready for you. Grog jumping to attention as the scent reaches your nose. The rest of you all slowly find your way back down. You eat--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we come out and see Vax in the armor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you putting on the armor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just looking at it in the hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I guess I step out and see him looking at it in the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still pretty tired, to be honest. Didn't sleep a lot in the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Some of you guys step out, and you see Vax standing in the hallway, clutching in his hands, looking over all the various, like, pushed-in, engraved runes across the leatherwork, the raven feathers that adorn the bottom of the mantle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Careful, it smells a lot like must and mold and birds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk by and... briefly lock eyes and keep going without saying anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, you got the armor now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He stole it, what can I say? He is a really sneaky, stealthy kind of guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Fair and square.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just took it for fashion purposes, I suppose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you need all the help you can get.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go out in the woods and unleash an undead beast that will kill us all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Christmas morning! Who has that, by the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, it's safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where d'you keep it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Hold on-- Got a pouch or some-- you know what? It's back in my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You go retrieve it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we bring Pike with us? I know she's taking care of Gilmore, but.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm, that's possibly more important. I think this thing'll be fine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need some sort of somebody that can heal, I think we've learned this for ourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can heal!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got potions, we're fine. It's probably, like, a big Saint Bernard. What's the big deal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) Okay. We learn nothing, carry on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Shit, you were quiet. Hello.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (coughs) Hello. Good morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Need any coffee? An enema?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A coffee enema?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What!? No. I'm fine. Good morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk off with this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we go outside with the necklace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, where're we headed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The woods!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. The caves. I thought we were going to the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going to the caves on the edge of the woods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's the caves that are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going to go through the woods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) Into the woods!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. You all gather together and make your way northwest of Whitestone, towards where you found the stone giant fortress and the series of caves that are in the mountain behind it. You get there; it's still seemingly abandoned. You case the area for a while. No noticeable movement other than a few woodland entities that exist in that vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Primeval Awareness! (radar sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That is now the sound it makes every time you do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so hold onto that one. I'll make that a new ringtone sound for you guys. What are you looking for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there's so many things I could sense!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about sirens?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sirens?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, what are those things called? The things that took our horses the last time we were here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Harpies?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure! Harpies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For how many miles is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six miles!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six miles? Yeah, there's a few blips on the far, far western side of here. You get the essence way off in the mountains, there's maybe a small nest. Nothing that's immediately dangerous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about if I sit for one more minute and I think if I can sense any giants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, to the far, far north. You get the sense that there is some sort of giant-based lifeform maybe two, three miles north of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's it look?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, clear of the things I checked for. No giants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet! Let's go! Up to the cave!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the fortress or the caves behind it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fortress or cave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were they both empty? I don't remember.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything was empty, if I recall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Small space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do the caves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, sure. Cave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, if we stick to the woods, it's my favored terrain. If we go into a cave, not as much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The caves would contain it. It can't fly away or anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So is it like, cave-fortress, are they same level? I can't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pathway that leads up into a small ravine in the mountain pass where you guys originally walked down into Whitestone. Up against the north side of where the mountain meets that ravine, there's a big stone fortress that is built into the side of the mountain, and then around that are a series of smaller caves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Anything can happen in the woods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to this fortress, then we got more room to move in case it does suck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, fine, fortress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys find your way inside, the cold morning air still has encompassed the stone floor itself, you can see there are still the scattered and slowly decomposing bits of meat and flesh in the far corner, you still see the splatters of blood that have turned black and cracked as it dried. No corpses here, as the corpses were retooled by the Briarwoods while they were in control. The fortress other than that is still empty, and seemingly untouched since you last left it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well, I'm just going to do it then!

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Wait wait wait!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, there's doors open to the cave, right?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: We're in a fortress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fortress. Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Coffee's just starting to kick in for you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just barely! Do we have any buff spells or some shit that we should cast, to make us cooler?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I throw a wall up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A wall for what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I need to bar the entrance? Or are there doors?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, by the way--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are doors, but they're partially ajar where you left them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, put it on, it's useful!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. We're not having this conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, by the way, I've got something for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Yes, dear?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I pull out the arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come here, let me show you. In theory, this is a siege arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shattering stone, shattering doors, breaking things that should not be broken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Breaking hearts left and right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that is what you're after. It should work! Never forget you're my favorite, and I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kiss him on the cheek. Thank you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was much nicer than your brother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a black eye?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (stammering) I didn't sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh. This is lovely, I can't wait to use it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There'll be more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, in three, two--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait hold on, hold on hold on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a circle! Aim it into the center of the circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is it three-two-one, three-two-one-do it, or three-two-one and go,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the one. On one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Jenga, one one-thousand two one-thousand three one-thousand four one-thousand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should one of us leave the room in case it comes out and paralyzes all of us? Just going to throw that out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, we should, what do you call it, spread out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, definitely, let's all surround it and make sure we're not all clumped up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If only someone had armor that could make them immune to paralysis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not a bad idea, you get controlled by things. Maybe you could wait just a little bit further back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This was somebody's pet, all right? It's probably not smart enough to take control of our minds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a big if.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mind stepping out, but I would like to be able to see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! We won't shut the door, I just want you outside of any potential blast radius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's spread out in a circle; we'll let it loose in the center, that way it can't even see all of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I like it. It only gets to see Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can see me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stealth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, when a thing is born, it latches on to the first thing it sees, like its mama.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we're going to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, stealth check from both of you guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going to try and talk to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Scanlan's going to talk to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan? You prepared?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just teleport, there's like a phase effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you back off and find the nearby shaded corners, where some of the haphazardly tossed hides and furs are in the corner, you vanish behind the alcoves keeping a watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, don't stand next to me, it gives it away. Go stand next to Keyleth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a doorway in the fortress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's the main doorway you guys entered, which is two--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I stand in that, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you stand there, in the entranceway that's pushed open, which is wide enough for a giant to push through. You got a little bit of room to each side, but you're there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, is this g-- Vax?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fine, you're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here we go, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, those two are stealthed-- I'm at Scanlan's left shoulder, back a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket's next to you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Trinket's next to me. I'm rolling with Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a little bit of distance, yes, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, and there's Percy here, and Travis is off this way. Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to use this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we don't know how to use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the power of Raven's Slumber, I command thee: (yells) awaken! Beast! Cruel or otherwise! Face your new master, and know his name is Scanlan! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Oh, holy shit! Never could've been better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you spend your bonus action to release the gate hold on the crystal, you guys see as he thrusts his hands forward, there's a burst of shadow energy that, almost like someone throwing a big pot of water, this blackness goes out of it, and then as it hits the ground, it spills into smoke on the ground, and as that dark form stops, it is in the form of an about waist-to-lower-torso-height creature. As the form coalesces into its normal self, you can see before you, shaking its head, a rather large, dark grey and black wolf. (growls, snarls)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Easy, easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Told you it was a dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Easy. We're friends. Here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's backing up a little bit, snarling. You see Trinket starts growling, (growls).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, be nice-- oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that (snarls) it looks over at you in the far corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I'm natural 20! That still didn't see me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pet Trinket, like, 'Chill, chill, be cool'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket backs up a little bit, but still locking eyes. You can see this wolf now, its gums and teeth are bared, its fur is all puffed up, its tail is-- it's definitely holding its ground and trying to make itself look as intimidating as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a small beast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be, technically, borderline medium. This'd be medium, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can only speak with small beasts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, use Speak with Animals?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) She swatted me and said, 'Put your armor on,' so I'm doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That'll take you about 15 minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 minutes! Well, guess I'm doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You don't just slip on leather armor. (chuckles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I get that, I get that, I would've guessed two minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can somebody check to see if it's actually a wolf or just looks like one? Like, check it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a bit far away from it right now. You can try to get closer if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sneak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make another stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should yell out, 'I'm stealthing'.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm stealthing! Damn it. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you begin making your way forward, it doesn't seem to notice you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, it doesn't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see it better now to perceive it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking right at it, and from your experience in the wild as well, and Keyleth, you're getting it, this does not appear to be anything beyond a large wolf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Galdric, Galdric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an animal handling check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Animal handling! We've never done that before!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I help my brother get on the armor, will it happen faster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I help him put on the armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Ow ow ow! That's too tight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you're not the same size as the other guy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's a little bit better. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be-- That's a 21 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, can't you talk to, like, plants and shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of piercing damage as its jaws clench down on your hand, and you tear your hand away. You can feel the warmth flowing under the glove.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gently, I'm gentle with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Speak with Animals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I click my Boots of Haste!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you getting dressed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can dress faster!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Speed change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quick change.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven-and-a-half minutes! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all become immediately aware of the creaking of leather in the distance as the two siblings are in the process of fast-changing one of the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rustle of feathers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I cast Speak with Animals. And I crouch down to the ground. And bow down a little bit, and I say: are you the one they call Galdric?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over at you for a second. The growl stops, and its posture changes a little bit. It raises its nose. (sniffs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was Purvan your master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at you as you guys hear Keyleth making this series of growling sounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket totally understands you, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely enough, Trinket does, Trinket's like, (confused bear noise).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket is Scooby-Doo, apparently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shitballs! Taint! You going that way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I get a secret!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get more t-shirts in stock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we know that. We know that, guys. We know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That needs to happen. But there is still the Critical Role logo t-shirt available. What is happening? What is he--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a ring or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the ring still available?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If the ring is still available, check out our ring!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can respond back, right? Your master died a great champion for the Raven Queen. He has been paid a great honor, and now the Raven Queen has chosen a new master.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I push Vax forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he Donald-Duck-ing it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Practically. There are undergarments, but not much. It's, like, bare legs and knees, part of an arm. Yeah, he got thrust out of the changing room about 20 seconds into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I still walk toward the wolf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Waddle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No no no, I did the top, I did the top, c'mon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wolf turns his head a little bit curiously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I continue to speak to the wolf.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I kneel. And bow my head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A great darkness has fallen upon our lands. Upon Othanzia. We could use all of the assistance that we can achieve. Would you be willing to find a new purpose? Join Vax'ildan--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell him to come forward and look into my eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) That's a bad idea for dogs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) It's gonna bite your face off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Galdric. Please. Approach your new master and look into his eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give him some chocolate, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wolf looks towards you, looks towards the loosely half-dressed half-elf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look into his eyes. I said look into his eyes. And see the touch of the Raven Queen inside of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wolf slowly stalks towards you across the stone floor. You can hear the claws of the wolf clattering against the stonework. As you can see it's partially, like, digging into the stonework with each step. It has purpose with each stride.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As it's coming, I'm taking daggers out and throwing 'em on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wolf stops and looks up at you. Turns around and walks towards the doorway where you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where who is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where Grog is. Grog, who's now at the door, at the exit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) What's his name?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Galdric.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Galdric!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeps walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Galdric!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going to stop him, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm in the doorway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, don't move. Don't move. Look at the dog. Don't move, and don't hurt the dog. Please just look at the dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out one of my treats I have for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket starts lumbering up towards you (thudding).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, Trinket-- This is for your buddy Galdric. Galdric!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just keeps walking, doesn't even look at you in the face, walks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw the treat and say, hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It scatters across the stone. Walks between your legs and exits out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pivot on my back foot. I take out Craven Edge--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I do, I take out Craven Edge and I sink it into the earth right beside his head. And I say, (shouts) heel!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, is it good, is it good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the sword (crack) into the rock outside of this fortress, it probably embeds itself a good foot and a half into the mountain. You guys all hear Grog's shout echo through the inside of the fortress itself, causing little bits of dust and small pebbles to dislodge from the roof, slowly fall down. The wolf has stopped and spun in its place and reached out and lashed the blade with its jaws and (cling) as it releases it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That went well! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dog whisperer!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good pup.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you its master now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is a very powerful beast. But it needs a firm hand. And I think it needs a job. So. What do we plan to do with Galdric? Said his name right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We plan on having him help us kill some dragons?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's a wolf. I think perhaps something a little less ambitious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket hides very well when dragons are around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, perhaps, joining the Whitestone conclave might be a-- Having him guard Whitestone, perhaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, yeah! I like it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach into the Bag of Holding and I pull out one thing of dry food rations, and a probably pretty rotten chunk of dark elf brain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did we get that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I, like a hamburger patty, smash it all together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only reason you even know this was at one point dark elf brain matter is because that's what you willed to reach in and find. It does not at all visually match your memory of its--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it have a little bit of a viscous-y ooze, mostly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, it's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll soften up the dry food.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gray Chicken McNuggets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll soften up a lot of things. It's pretty terrifying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll make the wolf vomit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wolves love getting drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very good. It leans forward and smells it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, it wasn't the best, I can do better. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket goes up and starts eating it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to barf that all over the carpet later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forget the chocolate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need to carry beef in this bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It goes bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have Dork! We've got nothing of Dork left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know what I have, by the way? I still have, like, a cooler Bag of Holding. That we got from the Slayer's Take.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pour into a little chalice some ale.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, it keeps things cold. Yeah, it's like a little bitty one, but it keeps parts from going bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nowhere near as large as a Bag of Holding, but it has a slow stasis for organic goods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should keep some food on hand next time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I offer him some ale, just to see if he even likes it. Some dogs like beer, some others don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm. Wolf doesn't seem to be interested.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, all right. Then I chug it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So are we telling this wolf something or commanding it to come with us as we return to town?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he would be helpful to guard the town, at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he'll follow Grog, I suppose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go back to town and bring him with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys return to Whitestone. It's another, like, three-hour trek to find your way back down to the city. Stalks up next to you. Definitely seems to be attentive to your commands. Doesn't appear to be a bond per se, but of everyone that it's encountered so far, you're the only one that really gathered its respect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I threw a treat at it. I don't understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great thing to throw at a giant 400-pound bull mastiff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I spoke words at it. Apparently that's not good enough. Communicating.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax looks like Edward Scissorhands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm peeling that off as we walk.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leave it the fuck on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm peeling it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really expensive. What, do you want to damage it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm peeling it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Fuck, he doesn't appreciate presents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you take what little bit of the armor you had on, off, and are you putting your other armor back on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't have any other armor. I took his armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have regular fucking armor that I grew up in with you, you fucking shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to trade with me, Vax? I've got some armor you could take.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a funny man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're back in town and you have a wolf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we find a holding pen for the wolf?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we need to. I think we can communicate to him--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Tell him not to attack villagers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ask him if he'll be willing to keep the town safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it in a really aggressive way, though, Keyleth. Stern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very aggressive? Okay. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should find some food for the thing, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I turned into a dog. If I turned into a wolf, do you think he'd respect me more?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he'll probably attack you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll mount you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or he'll bone you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not ready for that game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt's like, "mm-mm."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, that's happened before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I remember.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the troll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the troll. It was so good. That was you, wasn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it wasn't me. Was it you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who was getting humped on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Finalize this wolf so we can go kill something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my staff and I say, Galdric! I'm being assertive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the alpha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Grog, go stand behind her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want a task? I'll give you one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How long does Speak With--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for ten minutes, so you can cast it again. It's first level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, has it not been ten minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has been more than ten minutes. It took you three hours to return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we walked back? Okay, I'll cast it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I cast Speak With Animals on other people? I can't, right? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you shout, go ahead and make an animal handling check, with advantage because of your ability to speak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the-- what is that, 16? Plus a six, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Galdric turns to you and essentially leans towards you and you get the essence, the idea of a message across, and to keep me from having to walk behind now, at this point, as you guys have managed to make seeming amends at the moment, employs the idea of, "I'll listen if you give me a task."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He talked back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have him guard the village.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. (louder) Galdric. Only a beast of your great fortitude--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just fucking tell him to do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, okay. Sorry. Would you like to guard--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a command.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- the town, Whitestone? (shouting) Guard this town, dog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, repeat after me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In exchange for food, protect these lands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Galdric. In exchange for food, shelter, and a cozy fire every once in awhile--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a wolf. He doesn't need those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Patrol these lands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Protect these lands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Protect these lands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For how long?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) He already asked that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why does he want details? Why does the dog want--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as we need you to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. A great danger approaches.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until the danger has passed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll know it when it comes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clears throat) A great danger--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Approaches!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your service is required until that danger--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has passed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll know. You'll know, because they're fucking dragons, man. You'll know. Protect--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over and put my hand over Keyleth's mouth. You stay. We feed you. Is there a tavern or a butcher shop or something nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a butcher. As you're having this thought, however, Galdric turns back over to you and says, "I can feed myself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I will watch until this danger has passed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then am I free to go?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then you are free to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I grow tired of service. I wait too long." And the wolf looks at you, gives you like an acknowledgement, and then walks off into the woods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bye, buddy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Galdric. Appreciate it, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, that's a cool-looking wolf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Grog. How was that? Did that sound okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did good, you did good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought she did very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. It really liked you. You should learn how to talk to animals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that? What is that you have? What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding onto the Raven's Slumber jewel at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The thing that can capture evil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's empty now, and do you know what I bet would fit in it very nicely?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we can carry him around and then pop him out. Wait, okay, wait. Is it going to hurt him? Does it hurt him? Is it like, it's bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not only does it not hurt him, he does not age or feel any pain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A willing creature need not make a saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's automatic, and no time passes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try it, and I'm going to try it, and just to see how he likes it. If he's okay with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, buddy, come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around and look, you see there's a small puddle on the ground where Trinket has vomited up. He's pushing dirt over it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you got to teach him to quit rummaging, that is really foul.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's like scraping dirt over it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got a carrot on your chin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket. Do you want to go for a ride? You like rides? Yeah? You want to go for one? All right, sit still. This'll be fun. I don't know how to use it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just point, yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I point to him with the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should probably say something cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Words be damned. It takes you an action or so to activate the crystal, but as you do, Trinket gives a confused look before Trinket's shadow seems to crawl up his legs until it forms into this circle, this dark core, roughly half the size of Trinket's form, before it shoots into the crystal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he about this size, but I don't like that one, is he about this size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little larger than that before he goes into the crystal, but once he's in the crystal, it's small.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's a little crystal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinkachu, I choose you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. How do I let him go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you-- yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I release you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you do that, once again the same dark energy you saw earlier spills out and hits the ground in front of you, and from that dark shadow area Trinket's form emerges, standing there looking really confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How was it? Did it hurt? Can you talk to him? You can still talk to him. Talk to him. Ask him if it hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (vomiting noises) Vomits a little bit more on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's not good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, sometimes the teleportation makes you lose your lunch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask him how he's doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket? You all right buddy? You all right, there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Feeling sick."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask him how the little car ride was, ask him if he liked the ride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How was the ride? Did you feel all right? How was--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, would you mind, ask him if he'd mind doing that on occasion, you know, whenever I need him to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it like in there? Was it--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't remember."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's good, that's good. Would you mind--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask him if he cares if I do it again, ask him if he cares.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: MATT "If she wants me to, okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he say, what did he say? He looked really cute when he said something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a lot of men who will do anything for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, buddy! I go and hug him really tight and scratch his ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, and avoid the little bit of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --vomit on, I don't even care! Oh my gosh, thank you! This is the best, this is the best and we can travel with him, we can climb with him, we can sneak around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, and if Trinket isn't in it, you can also use it to capture baddies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it's great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And because of the way that the projection works, you could also in theory capture a baddie and then let them loose off a cliff and watch them drop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you're right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very convenient.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. You have a crystal, you've set a wolf on a path.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you going now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your home, I imagine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't we need to--oh, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's our to-do list?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't have to worry about it. We can, it's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire Ashari it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. What are the things that we need to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to check in on Keyleth's family.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cobalt Reserve, Ashari.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog's family.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we already take care of Osysa's mate, Frostweald?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but that's down--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the other Vestige, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, that's over by Grog's family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's information about the Vestiges.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to steal an airship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree, that's still very important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't remember where, what--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were by Kraghammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. I'm having terrible hiccups.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about, we need to find Kaylie at some point. We also need to, who's gone, where's Allu-- where's Ki-- where's people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura should be here in like a day. She should be here very soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's close to here? (hiccups)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing's close, we're specifically far away from everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we can go wherever we want as long as we've been there before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we should definitely go to the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire Ashari is the next--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go to the Fire Ashari.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, I'm immediately nauseous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's two of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Trinket, buddy. What time is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Do you need some water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still, with the travel to and from, it's middle afternoon, like one o'clock in the afternoon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're going to go, do we need anything before we leave? We got everything we need? Potions and stuff? Want to buy some meat for your cooler?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's get some meat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty easy to go ahead and procure it, five gold of meat will fill that thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and mark five gold off your paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much, could I buy a medical kit somewhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could find a general store and purchase a medical kit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to look that up right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, whatever, I've got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nifty that you have a book that tells you how much something like that costs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Imagine that. It's like it's a handbook of some kind, it's crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone have any fire-resistant items?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might pick up some fire resistant potions as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have this black iron plate that I haven't used ever. 'While wearing this heavy plate 'armor, the bearer gains resistance to any fire damage.'

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five gold for an herbalist's kit for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, plate armor, none of us can wear it but Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An herbalist's kit, like five gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can that stabilize people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If used with a medicine check, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I have this, which I can't wear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a purple and black robe. It was Lady Briarwood's robes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While wearing this robe, you gain resistance to piercing damage. Anybody need pierce resistance that can wear robes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty reasonable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I wear robes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Robes would be worn instead of your armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Gloves of Missile Snaring? That appeal to anyone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Missile snaring? What does that do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These gloves seem to almost meld into your hands when you don them, and when a ranged weapon attack hits you, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 plus your dexterity modifier provided that you have a free hand. If you reduce the damage to zero, you can catch the missile if it's small enough to hold in that hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it require attuning?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're pretty sleek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It requires two, no it just requires one free hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, but does it require attuning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes it does, it requires attuning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might be attuned out at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody? I feel like that could be cool for you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can take it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your dex? Your dexterity is not very-- actually, it might work out well for me, weirdly enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you fully attuned?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can undo something that I'm not using.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, you have access here in Whitestone to alchemy supplies, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt, I have access to alchemy supplies here in Whitestone, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I mean, there are elements of your initial workshop I guess, that a lot of supplies have been cannibalized but a few things can be pieced together. Plus there was a lot of alchemical elements and tools that were utilized in the subterranean tunnels as part of the refinement process for the whitestone residuum, the large vats of acid that were distilled by the Briarwoods while they were here, and there are other elements of their own tinkering in the alchemical arts that remain scattered throughout the castle. So yeah, you can definitely find enough to tinker with if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could take the rest of the evening and I can attempt to make some fire resist potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, here's what I'm thinking, right? I mean, if we go after my herd, we're in for a fight. A big one. If we go to your Fire Ashari, we're doing recon and hopefully learning something, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we're going to be in for a fight at the Fire Ashari as well because there's a giant sunder in the fire plane, and last time I checked there were fire imps and elementals pouring through there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are those bad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're annoying

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we're quick we can go about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's our mission?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You really want to get the rest of the testicles of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could theoretically see if there are survivors and I can attempt to close the tear in the plane. I don't know if I can do that. However, I don't know anyone else particularly more qualified to attempt it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Allura or that bearded dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're talking about the Fire Ashari and possibly what to do there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can go and look for survivors--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And bring them here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And someone should probably close the tear in the fire plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we wait for Allura then, before we go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if there are survivors, they might not be that way for very long if we don't go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've been there for a while already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If there are survivors--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then they're surviving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've survived. I agree. It's not going to be pretty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know you don't want to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really don't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we need to go. I say we take the rest of the day. You make your potions, we leave first thing in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait for Allura, hopefully she'll be here by then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe Allura will join us by tomorrow morning. If not, we teleport over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys are going to rest for the evening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, hold on, is there like a house of entertainment in Whitestone? I know it's just getting back on its feet but you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be a question more for Percival.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy? I'm having a bit of a soul struggle and I'm wondering if I might bend your ear for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, could I speak to you over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so, like, I want to get my freak on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, I, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, you're very attractive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was very unclear. So I know this is like your home and stuff and you might not have been aware of it, but they have these houses where like....

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, where you get your freak on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Yes, we have them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good, do you think they're still in order?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I imagine so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you point me in that direction?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I have no idea where they are. I do know that they exist. I actually had things to do here. I didn't have time for these.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, me too, important things. I was thinking for Scanlan in case he gets bored, you know, you've got to keep him focused.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't actually know where any of these places were, would I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, and those that did exist in this town have not been...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured as much. I'm just fucking with him. Okay. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just keep it between you and me 'cause he's very sensitive about these things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your secret is safe with my indifference. That's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, my, my, indifference

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're wonderful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I start telling that to people in real life?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes you can. I do it all the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Your secret is safe with my indifference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we set off on this, is there anything closer or more pressing? I don't actually know why we're going to her place, but I'm fine with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To look for survivors and close the giant tear in the fire plane that evil, well not evil, fiery entities are pouring through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a hellmouth, it's basically a hellmouth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's either that or we go goliath hunting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But this is quick, this is something that we can knock off the list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's knock it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right, let's just check it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As we're walking through town, do I see any weaponsmiths?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll help you make the potions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were two more than that overall, that were more like blacksmithy, but they both unfortunately lost their lives in the insurrection. But there are two functional blacksmiths in this, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And one's nearby, to pass through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a ten-minute diversion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm splitting off from the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to get out of here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One's in front of me now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you find your way to-- it's a small blacksmith, and most of it's outside. Though the day is growing late, you do see an older gentleman, long, tattered grey hair pulled into a very tight bun in the back and a beard that is actually tied off to the side. Otherwise it would be hanging down into his work. He's wearing soot-covered clothes, big leather apron, leather gloves, and he's currently in the process of (ping ping) turning over and hammering out a piece of orange glowing steel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, sorry to interrupt, I have a very simple request.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't stop. He seems to, he acknowledges your presence but he's still working as he's listening. (smithing sounds)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not looking for anything simple. Do you have a short sword? A regular old shortsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (ting) He looks over at you. "If that's what you're looking for, on that wall over there we've "got two shortswords." (ting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the difference between the two that I can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (smithing sounds) That you can see? Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking over them both, from this distance, they're both made with different hilt designs and different pommel designs, the grips are a little different but other than that the blades are pretty much identical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab one off the wall. I slap down six gold, which I know is way too much and say, thank you sir. Pelor lives here. And I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you start walking away he goes, "Hey."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're going to pay proper for that shortsword."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. How much does it cost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "12 gold pieces."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My apologies. 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "12 gold pieces, friend."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I put down six. I put down another 14. I really apologize. I was just confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have a good day."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk down the street going like-- it's big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys have all--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got an opal dagger you could have used.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't need your dagger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to make our potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, yes. All right, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have another question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your other question?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we all go to bed tonight can we get like a fuckton of the green stone under Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's really not a lot of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Say like $1,000 worth and maybe have like a real nice Heroes' Feast before tomorrow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wise as fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heroes' Breakfast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to do it at night, because I have to Tree Stride in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can choose either to create the potion or to mine the residuum for the evening. You cannot do both. Both are time, like, to pull that material from the-- because most of it that remains has been already embedded within the ziggurat beneath. You would actually have to physically chip it from the structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a plan, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will cover the 1,000 gold from our own party funds and have someone here mine some shit for us and give it to us later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like that plan, yeah. Sounds good to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about the wolf?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival, do you have people here who can mine? Looking for work, people--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, why not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let them know that they should start trying to pull the residuum out of the wall, but it's dangerous down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And tampering with it is definitely...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Necessary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should be ginger. It would, I'm trying to keep everything ginger down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe we should take 1,000 gold just from your family stores then, huh? That might be smarter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We currently have 1,000 gold from my family stores that are in the group treasury at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we do. No, that's 500. That was just 500. Just so you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like it was more than that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it was just 500.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, de Rolo, do you remember what happened yesterday?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't he, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to do such a nice thing for you, but never mind now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) No, no, no, do something really nice for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did I go? Oh, I went to buy a shortsword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, never mind. You went to buy a shortsword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dear, dear, dear, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Do nice things. All right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to be gentle with my family right now. They're taking on an awful lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're right. They're taking on so many people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we'll see what we can do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to think you hear me in your mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always fucking hear you in my mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just use the damned party funds for the time being. It's fine, Keyleth. This is a really important feast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're busy making potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you prepare a Heroes' Feast before you begin this potion-creation process? Is that what I understand or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I make some potions and then, like, I make dinner for us before we go to bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take you about the length of a day to create the potion, with his help it takes it to about half, so it'll be about 12 hours of creating. Eight to 12 hours. So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pick one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pick one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do a damn feast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do the potion as well. The feast only takes a moment to cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, okay. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying, be aware that you guys will probably have, if you want to get a full rest after that potion creation process, you're going to have to wait until like this time tomorrow, like late in the day to make your journey. Which is fine, if you're willing to be patient about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, no?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Say one, just say one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it, let's do it. Let's go in prepared and then we can always rest on that side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. For a fine, fine dinner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just want to make sure we feast right before we leave so that it's most useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You, everyone else goes to sleep while you and Percy work tirelessly through the night. If I could have you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Just for the sake of it, I want you to go ahead and make an arcana check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, an arcana? Do I get advantage because of my little skill in alchemy? I'm skilled in alchemy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Proficiency bonus, are you proficient in alchemy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So proficiency bonus, and for this, use intellect modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Intellect, which makes it plus seven. Do I have advan-- ooh, I rolled a natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll say, for the fair cost of, reduced due to the roll, 450 gold pieces, you create a potion of resistance of your choice of resistance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a long time, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire, all right. You create a potion of fire resistance. The materials cost you 450 gold to create, you finish it by about sunrise the next day. Everyone else begins slowly waking up after the night's rest as you guys both, bags under your eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that was a good night's sleep, I tell you what.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seriously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, could you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Oh, god, you snuck up on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you make me some tea real quick?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go fuck yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, you were up before me, I thought--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. All right, this is fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing a Heroes' Feast for breakfast, then? Is that how it's working?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take a nap. I'll cook breakfast, guys, good morning. Good morning!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hey, good morning, Keyleth!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you sleep during the day, we'll all take our feast, and then blast off at night time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I have to teleport and cooking this feast are both 6th-level spells and I can only do one of those a day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, it's hard being a druid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody else make a feast? That's here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike. Pike. Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's with Gilmore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) I miss Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all miss Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll cook breakfast, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'll cook breakfast. No, I won't cook breakfast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good idea, for you to not cook breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the plan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm cooking breakfast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you cooking breakfast or are you summoning breakfast? That's my question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you summoning breakfast and then you're sleeping and then we're leaving?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm summoning-- yes, I'm summoning breakfast and then I'm sleeping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then you're sleeping and then we're leaving as soon as you wake up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go ahead and you use Heroes' Feast, summoning forth a fantastical breakfast meal filled with coffee and eggs and everything you would hope for, the finest materials.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Froot Loops!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Sure, Froot Loops is on the menu, why not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucky Charms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No Lucky Charms, sorry, those aren't available on Tal'Dorei. But yes, all you guys take an hour to finish devouring this, you finish your meal, all you guys get a 2d10 hit point maximum increase to your hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, ooh, greens, greens!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And immune to poison, frightened, and all wisdom saving throws have advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage on wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the usual.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Almost broke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And wisdom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're immune to fear, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Immune to fear, poison, and what else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get advantage on wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After which, Percy and Keyleth pretty much fall asleep at the table as it vanishes and they both collapse to the ground, eggs out of the corner of their mouth. Eventually they make themselves back up to sleep and the rest of you guys peter around for the remainder of the day while they get their full rest. It now comes to, at the end of that eight-hour period of time, I'd say about three, four in the afternoon before they finally wake up. You've restored your spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the rest of you are ready to go about your business.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go, let's go, let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! While they're sleeping, right--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Scanlan aside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, friendo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't talk a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't handle personal emotional confrontation very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I come back, I feel bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, that was perfect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did you go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just kidding, just kidding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull up a chair, sit down, I want to ask you something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm already as low as I can go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right. How do you do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do I do what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or two days ago, fuck. Why do you do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Vax. I don't know, I mean, I like you people, okay? Everything before this was not as good. This is better. That's why. It's very simple. You had a shitty childhood, didn't you? You and the sister?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're probably going to die in the next month.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but it's fun while it lasts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Thought I might--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Glean some wisdom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm just as confused as before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, I'm older than you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much older?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bit. I've seen more than you have. And it's all shitty, so it just depends on how you look at it. You can dwell on the shit, or you can just leave it behind in people's beds and keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, that works on too many levels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, that's too deep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Too deep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did that. Water under the bridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I walk away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That little motherfucker shit in my bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you regather your will, path chosen; Keyleth, do you wish to prepare the transportation spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. All of you gather and find your way down to the Sun Tree in the center of the town. At this point, it's later afternoon, you've been growing accustomed these past few days of taking action right around dusk, and as the sky turns from a blue to a bit of an orangish hue, you all find yourselves ready to transition back over to the continent of Issylra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go. To the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth steps forward, touches her hand to the Sun Tree, completes her mental incantation, and you watch the trunk once again tear open into the somewhat oval walkway into the tree itself. On the opposite side, what's your destination?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god. As close as I can get to the Fire Ashari, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the same time, you can see a dull orange glow, and you all begin to step through in rapid succession, Trinket racing up after Vex. All of you find yourself stepping out the other side, at which point you look up and you can see the pathway that you took towards the top of the mountain where the Fire Ashari called Pyrah, where they maintained their ever-vigilant watch on the tear into the fire elemental plane. What you do notice immediately is that the path that you took initially is no longer a simple walkway. Against the now very dark sky, this side of the realm itself, night is, actually, no, sorry. At this point, you've actually beaten the sun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, do we gain a few hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys have gained a few hours, technically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are hundreds of feet off from this point as you step out of the tree. However, where you see the molten rock has reached the base of the mountain, you-- it's cooled and formed into solid rock at its base, and you start seeing flashes of the orange turning dark, then another section turns dark from the opposite side. And then a few moments pass and you can see the orange of the next section, up in like ten-foot segments, it's going dark and hardening on its own. You get the sense that your arrival did not trigger this more than it has been happening since before you arrived.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to figure out what's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Actually, this would be a perception check to see if you can ascertain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. It's difficult to make out at this distance, but you can see, along portions of the jagged mountainside, a collection of small figures that are making their way up the mountain, and their slow ascent is met with the lava flow cooling in sections.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look like people, like humanoids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell from this distance, they look human-ish, humanoid-ish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I attempt to use the optics on my gun to get a better look at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. A little bit of a clearer look through, they do appear to be humanoid. You do see two arms, two legs. You can't gauge size comparison from this distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, they're probably a good 800 feet up the mountain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 800 feet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they dressed like the Ashari that I've met?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can make out, their color palette shifts, there are reds and browns, some stand out as an aquamarine white. The Ashari you saw were a pretty consistent color palette. This is a little more varied.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know who these people are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They could still be Ashari. Just in their elemental forms. Are there any birds around? I look up, do I see birds in the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, because of the nature of this area, especially as the oppressive fumes and dust continue to pour off from the top of the caldera of this mountain range, it has made it not fitting for any sort of aerial life that you're used to seeing. You glance around for about a minute or two and you don't see any sort of bird life in the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did the ground cool where they were walking? Could we follow them up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's stay far behind. Let's go quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's walk. Stealth? I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Everyone make a stealth check, including Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to put him in the thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Try it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put it on a string so I could put it around my neck because it's a necklace because it's cooler that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it has a chain on it that it came with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got a chain on it, so it's around my neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you take it, you put--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It has a chain and a string now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chain and string.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The string's so you don't forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. You trigger the necklace, pointing it in the direction of Trinket, and once again Trinket is absorbed into the crystal, vanishing within the inside. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace is--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus ten. I rolled shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How are you going up the mountain? Are you scaling the cooled flow?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's probably the safest route given the fact that most of the other side of the mountain range itself is pretty jagged, and elements of it, because of the formation of this giant volcanic caldera, there are portions of broken stone and obsidian glass that sticks out the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
